task.title: Installing the add-on for
task.shortdesc: Use 's built-in add-on manager to install the add-on.

prereq.p: Ensure that you are using version 20.1 or later. For more information on downloading and installing this software, see

step.cmd: Launch and, from the main menu, select Help Install new add-ons .
From the Show add-ons from drop-down list, select Default Update Site and wait for the list of available add-ons to populate.
Select the check box and click Next.
If a warning against connecting to an unknown host appears, click Allow and remember.
On the License and signature page, select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement check box and click Install.
When the installation is completed, restart .
step.stepresult: When you restart the application, the view appears on top of your editor window.

step.cmd: If the view does not appear, open it from the main menu by selecting Window Show View .

taskbody.result: You can now perform the most critical interactions with local and remote repositories without leaving .
